name: Detective Darwin: Key In The Well
name_original: Detective Darwin: Key In The Well
description:
Can you find the gravekeeper's key?

Explore the depths of the graveyard's well in this casual Nokia platformer.

Made in 8 Days for the Nokia 3310 Jam 5

Controls
  • Left & Right Arrow: Move
  • Up Arrow: Jump / Use Ladders
  • Down Arrow: Advance Dialogue
Credits & Thanks

Programming, Art, Music, SFX, Design: Damon Bolesta

You, for playing!

Game made in Unity. Music made in Logic Pro. Art made in Photoshop. Uses the m3x6 font by Daniel Linnsen.
